def persistence(n):
    n = str(n)
    count = 0
    while len(n) > 1:
        p = 1
        for i in n:
            p *= int(i)
        n = str(p)
        count += 1
    return count
    # your code

def persistence(n):
    if n < 10: return 0
    mult = 1
    while(n > 0):
        mult = n%10 * mult
        n = n//10
    return persistence(mult) + 1
